byline.contributor: Additional reporting by C.J. Hughes, Marcelle Sussman Fischler, Suzanne Hamlin and Lisa Prevost.

lead_paragraph: This week’s homes include a four-bedroom house with a pool in Plandome, N.Y., and a three-bedroom ranch in Rowayton, Conn.

headline.main: Homes for Sale in New York and Connecticut

snippet: This week’s homes include a four-bedroom house with a pool in Plandome, N.Y., and a three-bedroom ranch in Rowayton, Conn.
